content:
As an AI language model, I do not have the ability to "hear" music, but I can provide some recommendations for rock albums you might enjoy:

1. "Ghosts V: Together" and "Ghosts VI: Locusts" by Nine Inch Nails - Two ambient instrumental albums released during the early stages of the COVID-19 pandemic that showcase the band's experimental side. 2. "The Slow Rush" by Tame Impala - A psychedelic blend of rock and pop that features introspective lyrics. 3. "Imploding the Mirage" by The Killers - A vibrant and anthemic album that features the band's signature pop-rock sound with some electronic elements. 4. "Hyperspace" by Beck - A genre-blending album that features elements of rock, pop, and electronic music. 5. "After Hours" by The Weeknd - A pop and R&B infused album with some rock influences. These are just a few examples of rock albums that have been released recently that you may enjoy. I hope you find something you like!
